How do blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches work in Verus, and what are the benefits of this approach?

In Verus, blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches allow for the creation of new currencies with minimum participation or automatic refunds. This means that users can set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in their preferred currencies on the chain. If by the start time of the blockchain, minimums are not met, all participants will automatically get a refund of all of their pre-conversions, less the network fees. This approach provides a secure and transparent way to launch new currencies, with benefits such as automatic refunds, pre-launch discounts, and vesting schedules.
